title: Deals: Samsung Galaxy S21+ refurb hits $615, Galaxy Watch 4 from $174, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are headlined by a one-day refurbished discount on Samsung Galaxy S21+. That’s alongside Samsung Galaxy Watch 4/Classic from $174 and the Made for Google iOttie iON Wireless Duo 15W Stand at $43. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Samsung Galaxy S21+ refurb hits $615, Galaxy Watch 4 from $174, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung Galaxy S21+ sees a one-day refurbished discount at Woot down to new low of $615 alongside Galaxy Watch 4 price cuts and more.
